.table edge
----

reach{from: A, to: C} :-
  A = C |
  edge{from: A, to: C} |
  edge{from: A, to: B} &
  reach{from: B, to: C}.
----

sameSCC{a: A, b: B} :-
  reach{from: A, to: B} &
  reach{from: B, to: A}.
----

edge{from: "a", to: "b"}.
----

edge{from: "b", to: "c"}.
----

edge{from: "c", to: "a"}.
----

edge{from: "d", to: "e"}.
----

edge{from: "e", to: "d"}.
----
